author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Christian Carlow for "HTML embedded in entity fields is rendered as text rather than HTML elements when using FTL" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5376
StringUtil.wrapString is now employed as it is on the order items section of the order creation review page.
